title: Can Potter Fix a Broken Chelsea?
description:
The FC crew discuss Graham Potter's appointment at Chelsea and whether the club will give him enough time over the long-term to find success at the club. Plus, Real Madrid must navigate the next month without Karim Benzema who's out due to injury and Antoine Griezmann continues to find find success despite his wild playing-time situation at Atletico Madrid.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Graham Potter's chances of success at Chelsea; Benzema's injury impact on Madrid; Griezmann's wild playing-time situation
